pre_caption: The video opens with a wide shot, positioning a large, domed neoclassical building in the center of the frame and the middle ground. Other buildings are visible in the middle ground on the left and right sides, while a sky with clouds occupies the background at the top. The camera, positioned at a low angle, rapidly dollies forward and tilts upward. This movement causes the shot to transition into a medium shot, with the central building moving from the middle ground to fill the foreground. The upward tilt shifts the focus from the entire structure to its upper half, centering on the triangular pediment and the base of the dome, while the golden statue at the very top remains in the upper center of the frame.

Avoid speculative statements like 'there might be,' 'it appears,' or ambiguous options like 'A or B'. Return only the one-paragraph video description without Markdown formatting or introductory text.

Indicate their approximate **2D position** within the frame using terms like **left, right, bottom left, bottom right, top right, top left, bottom, top, or center**.
